message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it's fair to propose a price of $11,000 for this valuable item. I understand its worth to you is $12,000, but I hope we can find common ground.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the value you're placing on the product.  I'm willing to pay $10,500.  That's a fair price for both of us and keeps the deal moving forward.
